page.title: 02A Day In The Life Of H Pope
page.content: I woke up at half past seven and got changed. I had cornflakes and a drink of hot chocolate for breakfast. Then I had a wash and got ready for school. I set off at eight forty with my hair up for swimming. When I reached school our group started on maths. We worked until playtime.Then after play our group went to Mrs Clarke,to do some writing. We watched a television program about electronic games and how they are made. After the program we had to write a short description about what kind of electronic game we would like to invent. When we had finished it was nearly time for lunch so we read for 15 minutes.After dinner our class went swimming. After swimming we listened to story and finished school at three o' clock. At five o'clock I go skating. I go to bed at nine o'clock and read for a few minutes.
